name: ef-stompit
description: A STOMP client library for Node.js that is fully compatible with STOMP 1.0, 1.1  and 1.2 servers. The library provides optional fault tolerance features such as  multiple server failover and persistent subscriptions and message publishing  across failure events. The API is designed to be consistent with idiomatic  Node.js code. Messages are stream oriented. The client supports any  stream.Duplex transport, such as for example tls.TLSSocket.
author: raza
